metadata.title: Rana Mashhood extends condolences to family of late PPP Leader Taj Haider

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Apr 09 (APP):Chairman Prime Minister's Youth Program, Rana Mashhood Ahmed Khan, extended his condolences to the family and friends of Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP) leader Taj Haider following his recent passing. In his condolence message, Khan acknowledged Haider's tireless efforts to promote the country's progress, highlighting his commitment to the principles of parliamentary democracy. Haider's legacy serves as a model for future generations of leaders, and his passing marks a significant loss for Pakistan's political landscape "I offer my heartfelt prayers for the family and loved ones of Taj Haider, may they find patience and solace during this difficult time. May the Almighty grant the deceased a place in His infinite mercy and bless his soul with eternal peace,"he stated.
